name: NSWorkspace.OpenConfiguration
desc: The configuration options for opening URLs or launching apps.

items.name: var requiresUniversalLinks: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether you require the URL to have an associated universal link.

items.name: var isForPrinting: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether you want to print the contents of documents and URLs instead of opening them.

items.name: var activates: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the system activates the app and brings it to the foreground.

items.name: var addsToRecentItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to add the app or documents to the Recent Items menu.

items.name: var allowsRunningApplicationSubstitution: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use a running instance of an application even if itâ€™s at a different URL.

items.name: var createsNewApplicationInstance: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether you want the system to launch a new instance of the app.

items.name: var hides: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether you want the app to hide itself after it launches.

items.name: var hidesOthers: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether you want to hide all apps except the one that launched.

items.name: var promptsUserIfNeeded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to display errors, authentication requests, or other UI elements to the user.

items.name: var appleEvent: NSAppleEventDescriptor?
items.desc: The first Apple event to send to the new app.

items.name: var arguments: [String]
items.desc: The set of command-line arguments to pass to a new app instance at launch time.

items.name: var environment: [String : String]
items.desc: The set of environment variables to set in a new app instance.

items.name: var architecture: cpu_type_t
items.desc: The architecture version of the app to launch.
